Phoenix::

"I -" Phoenix turns away.  Her voice becomes choking, as she reaches 
into a past she'd much rather leave buried.  "I was a slave of the 
Rogues.  They ... they thought it was good strategy to blow up a 
bunch of innocent civilians .... It was a living nightmare, watching 
them do their dirty work.  F-Flicker rescued me; that's why I'm here."

>

and

have 
> you been a soldier once in your life?"
